statements: SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT charity_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT donation_amount, charity_name FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE charity_name = 'Red Cross';
SELECT charity_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY charity_name;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donation_id, charity_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT charity_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY charity_name HAVING total_donations > 5000 ORDER BY total_donations DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE charity_name LIKE 'A%' AND donation_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT donation_date, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY donation_date ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donation_id, charity_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT charity_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY charity_name;
SELECT * FROM charities WHERE charity_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT charity_name, charity_description FROM charities ORDER BY charity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT charity_name, SUM(donation_amount) as total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY charity_name ORDER BY total_donations DESC;
SELECT donation_id, charity_name, donation_amount FROM donations JOIN charities ON donations.charity_name = charities.charity_name;
SELECT donation_date, charity_name FROM donations WHERE donation_amount < 500 AND charity_name = 'Red Cross' ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM charities WHERE charity_description LIKE '%children%';
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT charity_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT company_name, founding_date FROM company ORDER BY founding_date DESC;
SELECT charity_name, total_donations FROM charities WHERE total_donations < 5000 ORDER BY charity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT charity_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY charity_name;
SELECT charity_name, description FROM charities WHERE charity_name LIKE '%children%';
SELECT * FROM company ORDER BY founding_date;
SELECT company_name, industry, COUNT(*) AS total_companies FROM company GROUP BY industry;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT charity_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY charity_name;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM company ORDER BY company_location DESC;
SELECT charity_name, charity_description FROM charities WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(charity_description) > 20 ORDER BY charity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM donations JOIN charities ON donations.charity_name = charities.charity_name JOIN company ON donations.charity_name = company.company_name;
SELECT donation_id, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;

SELECT donation_id, charity_name, company_name FROM donations JOIN charities ON donations.charity_name = charities.charity_name JOIN company ON donations.charity_name = company.company_name WHERE donation_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT charity_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donations JOIN charities ON donations.charity_name = charities.charity_name GROUP BY charity_name;
SELECT charity_name, donation_date FROM donations JOIN charities ON donations.charity_name = charities.charity_name WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donation_id, charity_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donor_email FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT charity_name, charity_description FROM charities WHERE charity_name LIKE '%Children%';
SELECT donation_id, charity_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations JOIN donation_mapping ON donations.donation_id = donation_mapping.donation_id

SELECT donor_name, charity_name, donation_amount FROM donors INNER JOIN donation_mapping ON donors.donor_id = donation_mapping.donor_id INNER JOIN charities ON donation_mapping.charity_id = charities.charity_id
SELECT donation_id, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC

SELECT charity_name, COUNT(donation_id) AS total_donations FROM charities JOIN donation_mapping ON charities.charity_id = donation_mapping.charity_id GROUP BY charity_name ORDER BY total_donations DESC

SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donation_mapping ON donors.donor_id = donation_mapping.donor_id JOIN donations ON donation_mapping.donation_id = donations.donation_id GROUP BY donor_name ORDER BY total_donation_amount DESC
